about_the_game:
Set in the ancient immortal realm, long before humans existed, you play as one of the defenders of Empyrea, Yeaslin, defending against the wretched Equinox who have tarnished the kingdom through 1000 years of war. Led by the treacherous Lucas and his devious brother Nigel, the Equinox seek to oust the Emperor of Light, take rule over all of creation, and prevent the ongoing formation of the mortal realm, which would annihilate Earth before it can even begin.

  • Learn the way of the Heroes by retrieving and retaining Orbs (your primary source of strength). Orbs are everything! Always be mindful of your Orb Gauge (Mana) and Orb Vitality (Health). Should your opponent manage to deal damage to you, you'll lose Orbs, your very essence! Each hit drains from both your Orb Vitality and your Orb Gauge, making Magic use much more difficult. Retrieve lost Orbs and dropped Orblettes to maintain vitality.

  • Navigate the Empyrean and Earthly battlefields, protect your allies, vanquish the Equinox scum, and defeat General Nigel to expel the Equinox threat from the realms and liberate both planets of the blight that has taken too many lives!

While crafting is not available in this "Thousand Years War" Prologue to Supreme Heroes, due to all weapons having been masterfully maxed out with pinnacle properties, forged from the greatest minerals not yet known to man, you may still

  • Collect hidden loot, health items, and minerals in this Roguelike Action RPG Demo, and make use of the Hot Bar, which lets you have a more persistent and customizable slot menu where you can move or replace items straight from your collection however you wish. 

Combat in this demo involves Swordplay as well as Magic Projectiles in the form of 1 Short Spell and 1 Long Spell. As a Supreme Hero, you start out with your abilities maxed out, giving you a preview of every ability in the game, including gliding, flying, sprinting, double jumping, revealing hidden objects, and the free-flow Blitz attack.

The Fighting doesn't end after the "Thousand Years War". What began in Empyrea reaches across dimensions and threatens to lay waste to Earth, giving you a gauntlet of extra bosses to face in this demo.

If you survive the "Thousand Years War, you will need to 

  • Navigate through alternative historical landmarks, from the likes of Ancient Egypt to the Western Front where you'll be met with Bosses possessed by Nigel's spirit. Defeat them and keep traveling toward present day as Yeaslin searches for the Chosen One throughout the centuries, finding minerals for smelting along the way. The end of this Prologue begins Chapter One of the official Supreme Heroes game, coming soon. 

Show them what it means to be a Supreme Hero!
detailed_description:
Set in the ancient immortal realm, long before humans existed, you play as one of the defenders of Empyrea, Yeaslin, defending against the wretched Equinox who have tarnished the kingdom through 1000 years of war. Led by the treacherous Lucas and his devious brother Nigel, the Equinox seek to oust the Emperor of Light, take rule over all of creation, and prevent the ongoing formation of the mortal realm, which would annihilate Earth before it can even begin.

  • Learn the way of the Heroes by retrieving and retaining Orbs (your primary source of strength). Orbs are everything! Always be mindful of your Orb Gauge (Mana) and Orb Vitality (Health). Should your opponent manage to deal damage to you, you'll lose Orbs, your very essence! Each hit drains from both your Orb Vitality and your Orb Gauge, making Magic use much more difficult. Retrieve lost Orbs and dropped Orblettes to maintain vitality.

  • Navigate the Empyrean and Earthly battlefields, protect your allies, vanquish the Equinox scum, and defeat General Nigel to expel the Equinox threat from the realms and liberate both planets of the blight that has taken too many lives!

While crafting is not available in this "Thousand Years War" Prologue to Supreme Heroes, due to all weapons having been masterfully maxed out with pinnacle properties, forged from the greatest minerals not yet known to man, you may still

  • Collect hidden loot, health items, and minerals in this Roguelike Action RPG Demo, and make use of the Hot Bar, which lets you have a more persistent and customizable slot menu where you can move or replace items straight from your collection however you wish. 

Combat in this demo involves Swordplay as well as Magic Projectiles in the form of 1 Short Spell and 1 Long Spell. As a Supreme Hero, you start out with your abilities maxed out, giving you a preview of every ability in the game, including gliding, flying, sprinting, double jumping, revealing hidden objects, and the free-flow Blitz attack.

The Fighting doesn't end after the "Thousand Years War". What began in Empyrea reaches across dimensions and threatens to lay waste to Earth, giving you a gauntlet of extra bosses to face in this demo.

If you survive the "Thousand Years War, you will need to 

  • Navigate through alternative historical landmarks, from the likes of Ancient Egypt to the Western Front where you'll be met with Bosses possessed by Nigel's spirit. Defeat them and keep traveling toward present day as Yeaslin searches for the Chosen One throughout the centuries, finding minerals for smelting along the way. The end of this Prologue begins Chapter One of the official Supreme Heroes game, coming soon. 

Show them what it means to be a Supreme Hero!
name: Supreme Heroes Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X 6-Core 3.7 GHz
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2080 Super 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 9 3950X - Ryzen 9 3rd Gen 16-Core 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3090 24GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD for faster load speeds

short_description: A Fantasy Action RPG demo. "We're neither humans, nor spirits. We're the bridge between the two. We are immortals within mortal bodies. Our given name is Select Few. We had a beginning and an ending to our misguided ways. Had we not been chosen for such a task, we would've met the end of our days."
